sentences.english: When riled , the Druids of the Claw display ferocious power and stamina.
sentences.chinese: 当被激怒时，利爪德鲁依便展现出凶猛的力量和耐力。

sentences.english: But he did notice he had more physical stamina after the yearlong aerobic walking program.
sentences.chinese: 但他没发现经过一年的不行练习他的耐力更好了。

sentences.english: You just need to have the determination and staying power to self manage the courses you undertake.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的只是决心，以及自我管理所选修课程的耐力。

sentences.english: In the 8th National Games the endurance events attract peoples attention among all track and field matches.
sentences.chinese: 八运会耐力项目在田径项目比赛中是令人瞩目的。

sentences.english: Training cycle are reasonable, in line with the characteristics of long-distance endurance.
sentences.chinese: 训练周期安排合理，符合长距离耐力项目的特点。

sentences.english: Exercise tests showed higher endurance in subjects who had been eating high-fat diets in comparison with high-carbohydrate diets.
sentences.chinese: 运动测试显示高脂饮食比高糖饮食有较好的耐力表现。

sentences.english: Winterborn babies tend to have higher oxygen capacity, which increases soccer stamina.
sentences.chinese: 冬天出生的孩子氧容量高，因此踢足球的耐力好。

sentences.english: Rogues and Fighters now get a little more Stamina.
sentences.chinese: 浪人和战士将得到比较多的耐力了。

sentences.english: The dumbbell fly is a boxing exercise that strengthens the pectoral muscles and improves endurance.
sentences.chinese: 哑铃飞是一个拳击运动的加强和提高耐力胸肌。

sentences.english: He showed his remarkable endurance throughout the courtship.
sentences.chinese: 他在求爱期间展现了非凡的忍耐力。

sentences.english: Carbo loading is used by endurance athletes just before competing.
sentences.chinese: 耐力型运动员在比赛马上开始之前来补充碳水化合物。

sentences.english: The muscle strength and endurance of extensor in students with different sport levels are inferior to those of flexors.
sentences.chinese: 不同运动水平大学生伸肌群肌力和耐力弱于屈肌群。

sentences.english: And yes, carbohydrate is the essential fuel for prolonged endurance activity.
sentences.chinese: 当然，碳水化合物是延长忍耐力必要的燃料。

sentences.english: Nor does long our small Durance deal with that steep or deep.
sentences.chinese: 而我们耐力也有穷难以长应付这高这深。

sentences.english: It's what the Chinese women distance runners use to improve their endurance.
sentences.chinese: 中国的长跑女将都是用这个来增强耐力的。

sentences.english: Cell hydration promotes strength, endurance and recovery.
sentences.chinese: 细胞水化推动力量，耐力和恢复。

definition: (lit. and fig.) to carry a heavy load/to carry a heavy burden
to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
